title: Riot Matchmaking Rigged
body: Started a new account. Won 10+ games in a row. 64% Win rate. Have gotten to plat with ease (Have been Diamond+ before) and winning handily. Have Plat 2 MMR at Plat 5. Now comes promos and get the most toxic players in existence. Lose promos and ever since then. Have been matched with non-stop trolls, Chinese players who refuse to communicate properly (You don't need good English to communicate in LoL, everything has a word for it) or just players who will constantly feed. My MMR is now below plat 5 standard and am losing. Explain Riot. What changed within 2 days? Do you purposely match players with trolls/toxic/unskilled players after a winstreak? Do you purposely try and "challenge" good players by matching then with bad players to see if they're worthy of where they are despite the game being a team game and require everyone to work together?

replies.body: im bronze but whenever i seem to be finally confident and happy about my game results and matchmaking, i get that salt to reset all the happiness and goodness back to 0
Doesn't matter what rank you're at. It is 100% going to happen. It's pathetic.
